definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Rehoboam (word-play on [[רחב]] Sir 47:23 c);—king of Judah, son of Solomon; Roboam: 1Ki 11:43, 1Ki 12:1, 1Ki 12:3, 1Ki 12:6 + 16 t. 1Ki 12:14, + 1Ki 15:6 ‖ 2Ch 9:31, 2Ch 10:1, 2Ch 10:3, 2Ch 10:6 + 21 t. 2Ch 10, 2Ch 11:, + 2Ch 13:7, 2Ch 13:7; also 1Ch 3:10.
